title: SUCK MY DICK
lyrics:
The South Got Something to Say’s only skit, “SUCK MY DICK,” is a funny breather after the emotionally heavy content of the album up to this point, especially the preceding track, “Talk to Me Before I Die.”
Suck my dick
So, I just found out that you actually don't get paid if the song is not at least thirty seconds so
(Yo, I think you should put some reverb on it, or some shit)
If you guys wanna stick around or, you know
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, just like that)
Umm (Yeah, that's perfect)
I think we should be good in about two seconds, yeah
Yeah, yeah, that's good, alright
(Yo, just end it with a crash cymbal)
